scripts.network: hc sandbox clean && yarn build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "yarn workspace ui start" "yarn launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: yarn build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && yarn workspace tests test
scripts.network:tauri: hc sandbox clean && yarn build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "yarn workspace ui start" "yarn launch:tauri" "holochain-playground"
scripts.launch:tauri: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/scwr.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.package: yarn build:happ && yarn workspace ui package && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: yarn build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
